text: 12.20: 2 Ko 2.1-4Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gu maneŋ rivgiap kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Gu ŋgɨp, nde ganɨnga, nde gu vuzvugi gumgi gu mbigi ki kɨrɨ tɨvar muunga fhu. Nde vhɨra, nde na ganɨv khaŋ na suanga, “Nza khaŋ muuŋgi guma ganɨngeŋ vuzvugi fhu.” Gu ŋgɨp, kha khesharigi tɨvi ganɨrim, nta nde rɨgar kɨrga. Kha khesharigi tɨvi, nde warira daav, wari ga nzuai buni, harigi ntɨɨri ga nzuav ndavi shi, vhegi, fhura ferferi, harigi gumgi nzɨɨi, harigi gumgi zɨn mbav mbe nzuai, rɨɨrɨɨi, ŋaarir farfagi. Gu mba khesharigi tɨvi ganɨngeŋ thagi.
